thread.title: Michjael & Francine Funke
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Michjael & Francine Funke

author: Michjael & Francine Funke
title: Michjael & Francine Funke
text:
My wife and I are new to Texas, and we needed furniture. We visited a number of showrooms in the Austin area, to no avail, and then we found The Home Zone!
Great furniture; Great prices; and, Great sales reps!!!
We were/are totally satisfied with our new dining room set and dresser!!
Check them out before buying anywhere else!!!
